mapper.select: select (select count(*) from tcst0001 where to_char(join_dt, 'YYYYMMDD') = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD')) as joinTodayCount, (select count(*) from tcst0001 where del_yn = 'N') as totalUserCount
select no as no, user_id as userId, user_nm as userNm, tel_num as telNum, to_char(join_dt, 'YYYYMMDD') as joinDate, gender as gender, age as age from tcst0001 where del_yn ='N'
mapper.insert: insert into tcst0001(user_id, password, user_nm, join_dt, tel_num, gender, age, del_yn) values (#{userId}, #{password}, #{userNm}, #{joinDate}, #{telNum}, #{gender}, #{age}, 'N')
mapper.select: select user_id as userId, password as password, user_nm as userNm, join_dt as joinDate, tel_num as telNum, gender as gender, age as age from tcst0001 where del_yn = 'N' and user_id = #{userId} and password = #{password}
select count(*) from tcst0001 where user_id = #{userId}
